page.title: 04Housing Around Dunnington
page.content: We sent out 80 questionnaires to local households. We had 42 replies; 21 from owner occupiers, 20 from tennants in private rented accommodation, and 1 from a council tennant. We found that the oldest property was built in the 11th century. The latest was built in 1984. Almost all the privately rented houses (14) were built before 1900. Half (10) of the privately owned houses had been built since 1950. There were no new houses built in the village between 1910 and 1950. In our survey, 31 houses were detached and 10 semi-detached. All houses have electricity and inside toilets, 5 have bottled gas and 37 have telephones. 36 are 2 storied, 18 have 3 bedrooms and 12 have 4. Many of the privately rented houses are owned by the Ragley Estate.
